assignments.description: assign the value from the outcome detail field that appears when choosing Care Incomplete
assignments.name: Assign_Ci_OD
assignments.label: Assign Ci OD

assignments.description: assign the value from the outcome detail field that appears when choosing Emergency Department
assignments.name: Assign_ED_OD
assignments.label: Assign ED OD

assignments.description: assign the value from the outcome detail field that appears when choosing Urgent Care
assignments.name: Assign_UC_OD
assignments.label: Assign UC OD

assignments.description: Both VVC and CVT modalities require a video consent and phone consent equal to False
assignments.name: Assignment_for_VVC
assignments.label: Assignment for VVC & CVT

assignments.description: When no Triage Tool is used the Date/Time stamp for Vital Signs will be the Clinical Triage Progress Note Created Date/Time
assignments.name: PN_Date_Time
assignments.label: PN Date Time

assignments.description: When the Triage Tool is used the Date/Time stamp for Vital Signs will be the Clinical Triage Progress Note VCC_Triage_Date__c.
assignments.name: Triage_DateTime
assignments.label: Triage DateTime

choices.description: A user will select this option if their answer to "Will you be completing a Columbia Screening?" is No.
choices.name: ColumbiaScreeningNo

choices.description: A user will select this option if their answer to "Will you be completing a Columbia Screening?" is Yes.
choices.name: ColumbiaScreeningYes

constants.description: This constant utilizes the Empty String value to construct a line break for use in formatting of medication, allergy, and problem text screen components
constants.name: linebreak

decisions.description: Decide if the result of a Columbia Screening is negative or positive.
decisions.name: Columbia_Screening_Result
decisions.label: Columbia Screening Result

decisions.description: Was a Triage Tool used to document Vital Signs?
decisions.name: CT_RN_Triage_Completed
decisions.label: CT RN Triage Completed

decisions.description: This decision is for when a patient is not reached, it will branch off and end the flow, otherwise continue on normally.
decisions.name: HasPatientBeenReached
decisions.label: HasPatientBeenReached

decisions.description: Depending on which Outcome was chosen in the previous screen, A different Outcome Detail Picklist was used. It needs to be determined which field value needs to be stored based on the options chosen, so that the record can be updated accordingly.
decisions.name: Outcome_Detail_Assignment_Signpost
decisions.label: Outcome Detail Assignment Signpost

decisions.description: Users will be prompted to select yes or no to "Will you be completing a Columbia Screening?", If yes the Columbia Screening questionnaire will be completed if no the questionnaire will be bypassed and no Columbia Screening Record will be created.
decisions.name: Will_a_Columbia_Screening_be_completed
decisions.label: Will a Columbia Screening be completed?

Flow.description: From a Tele EC Case Record Page, the "Nurse Progress Note" action will launch the TED Nurse Progress Note Screen Flow to create a Tele-EC Nurse Progress Note and Columbia Screening Records. Release 1.12.0 Vital Signs Timestamps Release 1.13.0 Add Change Toggle Validation Formula to skip the Progress Note Columbia Screening Validation Rule Release 1.14.0 Add Chief Complaint field Adding Outcomes 1.15.0 Patient verification data, alignment with VHA Directive 1907.09 1.16.0 CVT modality in Type of Visit 1.17.0 PTEMSTUC-2446 Added Variables to capture and concatenate historical Medications, Problems, and Allergies to newly entered values. Added Get Records. Updated the Vitals screen Long text fields. Updated the last Update Records node. 1.17.0 PTEMSTUC-2272 Moved Tele Health disclosures screen first, and added a radio button of "Has the patient been contacted", required and added correct previous buttons 1.17.0 PTEMSTUC-2605 Tele-EC RN Receives Error When Using Previous Button on Columbia Screening Screen Within Create PN Flow 1.17.0 PTEMSTUC-2739 Default "Type of Visit" to 'Phone" if "No, Patient has not been reached" is selected 1.17.0 PTEMSTUC-2943 Remove "/patient denied care" wording 1.18.0 PTEMSTUC-2792 Update Columbia Screening flow and decouple CS and PN 1.19.0 PTEMSTUC-2332 Date/Time will update to current date/time on PN when edited in UI 1.20.1 PTEMSTUC-3271 Update the Columbia Screening Questions in the RN Progress Note

dynamicChoiceSets.description: This holds the "TUC_Has_the_patient_been_reached__c" picklist from the progress note
dynamicChoiceSets.name: HasThePatientBeenReachedPicklistChoiceSet

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Select Progress Note Type: Tele-EC Chart Review or Tele-EC MP Progress Note
dynamicChoiceSets.name: TUC_Progress_Note_Type

dynamicChoiceSets.description: TUC Consult outcome after patient assessment.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: TUC_ProgressNoteOutcome

formulas.name: BloodPressMethod
formulas.expression: IF(ISBLANK({!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_Diastolic_Blood_Pressure__c}), NULL,"Reported")

formulas.name: ColumbiaDueDate
formulas.expression: TODAY() + 1

formulas.description: Concatenates Questions and Answers for the Columbia screening questionnaire.
formulas.name: ColumbiaQ1
formulas.expression: "Over the past month, have you wished you were dead or wished you could go to sleep and not wake up?" &' '& {!Answer_1}

formulas.name: ColumbiaQ2
formulas.expression: "Over the past month, have you actually had any thoughts about killing yourself?"&' '&{!Answer_2}

formulas.name: ColumbiaQ3
formulas.expression: "Over the past month, have you been thinking about how you might do this?" &' '&{!Answer_3}

formulas.name: ColumbiaQ4
formulas.expression: "Over the past month, have you had these thoughts and had some intention of acting on them?"&' '&{!Answer_4}

formulas.name: ColumbiaQ5
formulas.expression: "Over the past month, have you started to work out or worked out the details of how to kill yourself?"&' '&{!Answer_5}

formulas.name: ColumbiaQ6
formulas.expression: "If yes, at any time in the past month did you intend to carry out this plan?"&' '&{!Answer_6}

formulas.name: ColumbiaQ7
formulas.expression: "In your lifetime, have you done anything, started to do anything, or prepared to do anything to end your life?"&' '&{!Answer_7}

formulas.name: ColumbiaQ8
formulas.expression: "If yes, was this within the past 3 months?"&' '&{!Answer_8}

formulas.description:
This formula concatenates 2 medication fields from the CT progress note so they may be viewed as a single list on the Vitals screen
IF both fields are not blank Then concatenate them Else if the first field is blank, then populate the other field else populate the first field
formulas.name: CT_Medications_Concat
formulas.expression: IF(AND(NOT(ISBLANK({!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_NonVA_Medications_Renewal_Request__c})),NOT(ISBLANK({!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_Medications_Refill_Renewal_Request__c}))), {!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_Medications_Refill_Renewal_Request__c}& ', '&{!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_NonVA_Medications_Renewal_Request__c}, IF(ISBLANK({!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_Medications_Refill_Renewal_Request__c}), {!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_NonVA_Medications_Renewal_Request__c}, {!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_Medications_Refill_Renewal_Request__c}))

formulas.description: Clinical Triage Progress Note has data for Vital Signs the Method defaults to Reported. If there are no Clinical Triage Vitals when a Tele-EC User inputs a value Method field should default to Observed if not NULL.
formulas.name: forBloodPressureMethod
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_Systolic_Blood_Pressure__c})), "Reported", IF( ISBLANK ({!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_Systolic_Blood_Pressure__c}) && NOT (ISBLANK ({!Systolic_Blood_Pressure})), "Observed", IF( ISBLANK ({!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_Systolic_Blood_Pressure__c}) && ISBLANK ({!Systolic_Blood_Pressure}), NULL, "" ) ) )

formulas.description: If Method field is Observed Date/Time field is NOW(), if Method is Reported Date/Time is TXCC Date/Time if a Triage Tool was used, if no Triage Tool was used Date/Time is Clinical Triage Progress Note Date/Time. If there are no Vitales Date/Time is NULL
formulas.name: forBloodPressureTimeStamp
formulas.expression: IF({!Blood_Pressure_Method= 'Observed'}, {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}, IF({!Blood_Pressure_Method= 'Reported'}, {!varTriage_or_PNDate}, NULL))

formulas.description: Formula to Bypass Columbia Screening Validation Rule when updating a Nurse Progress Note through the Flow.
formulas.name: forChangeToggleValidation
formulas.expression: IF({!Get_Progress_Note.TED_ToggleValidation__c}=TRUE, FALSE, TRUE)

formulas.name: forPulseMethod
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_Pulse__c})), "Reported", IF( ISBLANK ({!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_Pulse__c}) && NOT (ISBLANK ({!Pulse})), "Observed", IF( ISBLANK ({!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_Pulse__c}) && ISBLANK ({!Pulse}), NULL, "" ) ) )

formulas.description: Clinical Triage Progress Note has data for Vital Signs the Method defaults to Reported. If there are no Clinical Triage Vitals when a Tele-EC User inputs a value Method field should default to Observed if not NULL.
formulas.name: forPulseOximetryMethod
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_Pulse_Oximetry__c})), "Reported", IF( ISBLANK ({!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_Pulse_Oximetry__c}) && NOT (ISBLANK ({!Pulse_Oximetry})), "Observed", IF( ISBLANK ({!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_Pulse_Oximetry__c}) && ISBLANK ({!Pulse_Oximetry}), NULL, "" ) ) )

formulas.description: If Method field is Observed Date/Time field is NOW(), if Method is Reported Date/Time is TXCC Date/Time if a Triage Tool was used, if no Triage Tool was used Date/Time is Clinical Triage Progress Note Date/Time. If there are no Vitales Date/Time is NULL
formulas.name: forPulseOximetryTimeStamp
formulas.expression: IF({!Pulse_Oximetry_Method = 'Observed'}, {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}, IF({!Pulse_Oximetry_Method = 'Reported'}, {!varTriage_or_PNDate}, NULL))

formulas.description: If Method field is Observed Date/Time field is NOW(), if Method is Reported Date/Time is TXCC Date/Time if a Triage Tool was used, if no Triage Tool was used Date/Time is Clinical Triage Progress Note Date/Time. If there are no Vitales Date/Time is NULL
formulas.name: forPulseTimeStamp
formulas.expression: IF({!PulseMethod = 'Observed'}, {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}, IF({!PulseMethod = 'Reported'}, {!varTriage_or_PNDate}, NULL))

formulas.description: Clinical Triage Progress Note has data for Vital Signs the Method defaults to Reported. If there are no Clinical Triage Vitals when a Tele-EC User inputs a value Method field should default to Observed if not NULL.
formulas.name: forTemperatureFMethod
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISBLANK ({!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_Temperature__c})), "Reported", IF( ISBLANK ({!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_Temperature__c}) && NOT (ISBLANK ({!Temperature})), "Observed", IF( ISBLANK ({!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_Temperature__c}) && ISBLANK ({!Temperature}), NULL, "" ) ) )

formulas.description: If Method field is Observed Date/Time field is NOW(), if Method is Reported Date/Time is TXCC Date/Time if a Triage Tool was used, if no Triage Tool was used Date/Time is Clinical Triage Progress Note Date/Time. If there are no Vitales Date/Time is NULL
formulas.name: forTemperatureTimeStamp
formulas.expression: IF({!Temperature_F_Method = 'Observed'}, {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}, IF({!Temperature_F_Method = 'Reported'}, {!varTriage_or_PNDate}, NULL))

formulas.description: Clinical Triage Progress Note has data for Vital Signs the Method defaults to Reported. If there are no Clinical Triage Vitals when a Tele-EC User inputs a value Method field should default to Observed if not NULL.
formulas.name: forWeightMethod
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_Weight__c})), "Reported", IF( ISBLANK ({!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_Weight__c}) && NOT (ISBLANK ({!Weight})), "Observed", IF( ISBLANK ({!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_Weight__c}) && ISBLANK ({!Weight}), NULL, "" ) ) )

formulas.description: If Method field is Observed Date/Time field is NOW(), if Method is Reported Date/Time is TXCC Date/Time if a Triage Tool was used, if no Triage Tool was used Date/Time is Clinical Triage Progress Note Date/Time. If there are no Vitales Date/Time is NULL
formulas.name: forWeightTimeStamp
formulas.expression: IF({!Weight_Method = 'Observed'}, {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}, IF({!Weight_Method = 'Reported'},{!varTriage_or_PNDate}, NULL))

formulas.description: This formula combines the historic and new medications together in order to update the progress note (from the lwc and text field on the Vitals screen)
formulas.name: medicationsCombined
Pulse_Method
formulas.expression: IF(ISBLANK({!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_Pulse__c}), NULL, "Reported")

formulas.name: PulseOximetry_Method
formulas.expression: IF(ISBLANK({!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_Pulse_Oximetry__c}), NULL, "Reported")

formulas.name: TemperatureFMethod
formulas.expression: IF(ISBLANK({!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_Temperature__c}), NULL, "Reported")

formulas.name: WeightVitalMethod
formulas.expression: IF(ISBLANK({!Get_Progress_Note.VCC_Weight__c}), NULL, "Reported")

Flow.label: TED Nurse Progress Note

recordCreates.description: Create a "Draft" Tele-EC Nurse Progress Note if the PN flow is canceled.
recordCreates.name: Create_Tele_EC_Progress_Note
recordCreates.label: Create Tele-EC Progress Note

recordCreates.description: Element to create a Task when a Columbia Screening is Positive
recordCreates.name: CreateTasks
recordCreates.label: CreateTasks

recordLookups.description: This Get is used to retrieve 1 field value on the current progress note that was created in this flow. This field will be used to update the Active Patient Medications field on the Progress note. (Formulas: medicationsCombined)
recordLookups.name: Get_Current_Progress_Note_Infos
recordLookups.label: Get Current Progress Note Infos

recordLookups.description: When a Tele-EC Progress Note creation is cancelled the "Draft" version of the Progress Note that is saved should default to a PN Tele-EC Record Type
recordLookups.name: GetRNProgressNoteRecordType
recordLookups.label: GetRNProgressNoteRecordType

recordLookups.description: Get Tele EC Task record type
recordLookups.name: TasksRecordType
recordLookups.label: TasksRecordType

recordUpdates.description: Update Flag from True (default value) to False. This field works in the backend for Tele-EC Progress Note Flows, and 'Vital Signs Time Stamp Update' Record Triggered Flow.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Flag
recordUpdates.label: Update Flag

recordUpdates.description: Update Nurse's Progress Note Record, no Columbia Screening data captured.
recordUpdates.name: Update_PN_no_Columbia_Screening_Completed
recordUpdates.label: Update PN no Columbia Screening Completed

recordUpdates.description: This will update the progress note with the "no..." option on the "TUC_Has_the_patient_been_reached__c" picklist
recordUpdates.name: UpdateProgressNoteIsPatientReached
recordUpdates.label: UpdateProgressNoteIsPatientReached

screens.description: Screen displays an Alert when the Columbia Screening is positive to let Users know a Task was created.
screens.name: Columbia_Positive_Task_Created
screens.label: Columbia Positive Task Created

fields.name: PositiveColumbiaScreening_0
fields.fieldText: Alert: The Columbia Screening for Veteran {!Get_Account.FirstName} {!Get_Account.LastName} is Positive, a Columbia Screening record and a Task record have been created.

fields.name: NoColumbiaAlert
fields.fieldText: No Columbia Screening Alert

screens.description: Provide information about a Plan, Outcome and Referrals
screens.name: Columbia_Screening
screens.label: Columbia Screening

fields.name: CompleteColumbiaScreening
fields.fieldText: All prompted questions on the Columbia Screening Questionnaire must be answered. Once 'Next' is selected, a Columbia Screening Record will be created, and you won't be able to navigate back to the Questionnaire.

fields.name: Q1
fields.fieldText: Question 1. Over the past month, have you wished you were dead or wished you could go to sleep and not wake up?

fields.name: Q2
fields.fieldText: Question 2. Over the past month, have you actually had any thoughts about killing yourself?

fields.name: Q3
fields.fieldText: ﻿Question 3. Over the past month, have you been thinking about how you might do this?

fields.name: Q4
fields.fieldText: Question 4. Over the past month, have you had these thoughts and had some intention of acting on them?

fields.name: Q5
fields.fieldText: Question 5. Over the past month, have you started to work out or worked out the details of how to kill yourself?

fields.name: Q6
fields.fieldText: Question 6. If yes, at any time in the past month did you intend to carry out this plan?

fields.name: Q7
fields.fieldText: Question 7. In your lifetime, have you done anything, started to do anything, or prepared to do anything to end your life?

fields.name: Q8
fields.fieldText: Question 8. If yes, was this within the past 3 months?

screens.description: Provide information about a Plan, Outcome and Referrals
screens.name: Columbia_Screening_0
screens.label: Columbia Screening

fields.name: Will_you_be_completing_a_Columbia_Screening
fields.fieldText: Will you be completing a Columbia Screening?

fields.name: BypassColumbiaScreeningQuestionnaire
fields.fieldText: If 'No' is selected all questions will be bypassed and you won't be able to navigate back to the Columbia Screening Questionnaire.

screens.description: Progress Note Type and Consult Origin
screens.name: Evaluation_Type_and_Consult_Origin
screens.label: Evaluation Type and Consult Origin

fields.name: Phone_Consent_Disclosure
fields.fieldText:
Telehealth Disclosure:

Visit conducted by synchronous telehealth.

Patient verbal consent obtained.

Location/emergency number confirmed.

validationRule.errorMessage: Consent needs to be obtained before proceeding

fields.name: VVC_Consent_Disclosure
fields.fieldText:
Telehealth Disclosure:

Visit conducted by synchronous telehealth.

Patient verbal consent obtained.

Location/emergency number confirmed.

Environment surveyed and all participants identified.

Virtual conference room locked.

validationRule.errorMessage: Consent needs to be obtained before proceeding

fields.name: FlagError
fields.fieldText: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: NewProgressNoteConfirmation
fields.fieldText: A new Progress Note has been created.

screens.description: Provide information about a Plan, Outcome and Referrals
screens.name: RN_Progress_Note_Outcome
screens.label: RN Progress Note Outcome

fields.name: Time_Spent_with_Veteran
fields.fieldText: Time Spent with Veteran (Enter up to 2 digits to reflect time in minutes)

validationRule.errorMessage: Please input up to 2 digits to reflect time in Minutes

screens.description: Patient's Current Location (can be an address or a description of a location) and Callback Phone Number
screens.name: TUC_Patient_Location_and_Callback_Number_0
screens.label: Patient Location and Callback Number

fields.name: HasPatientBeenReachedInformation
fields.fieldText: Note: If No, Patient unable to be reached is selected, the Progress Note will be Saved and Exited

fields.name: VeteranName
fields.fieldText:
Veteran's Name: {!Get_Account.FirstName} {!Get_Account.LastName}

SSN: {!Get_Account.HealthCloudGA__TaxId__c}

DOB: {!Get_Account.PersonBirthdate}

fields.name: Confirmed_Veteran_s_Current_Location_and_Phone_Number
fields.fieldText: Confirmed Veteran's Current Location and Phone Number

screens.label: Update Nurse PN No Columbia Screening Error

screens.name: UpdateProgressNoteHasPatientBeenReachedError
screens.label: UpdateProgressNoteHasPatientBeenReachedError

fields.name: DisplayErrorMessageHasPatientBeenReached

textTemplates.description: This template uses the linebreak constants to create a double line space break so the format of the medications, problems, and allergies can be maintained
textTemplates.name: linebreakTemplate

variables.description: This text variable holds the No choice on the "TUC_Has_patient_been_reached__c" picklist to compare against inside the decision
variables.name: HasPatientBeenReachedTextVariable

value.stringValue: No, patient unable to be reached

variables.description: This variable holds the list of medications from the CT progress note, to be transferred to the Tele-EC RN Progress note
variables.name: Medications_Info

variables.description: holds the value of the outcome detail field to update the progress note
variables.name: OutcomeDetailToUpdate

variables.description: Variable to store the current project ID
variables.name: TUC_CurrentCaseRecordID

variables.description: TUC Virtual Visit Record Type to create a Progress Note
variables.name: TUC_VirtualVisitRecordType

variables.description: Variable for the ID of the ProgressNote__History
variables.name: varHistoryID

variables.description: The variable will assign a Date/Time value for when Vitals Signs were registered. If a Triage tool was used the Date/Time value will be Triage Date, if not, the Clinical Triage Progress Note Created Date/Time.
variables.name: varTriage_or_PNDate
